title: DMK नेता के महिला को पीटने का 2 साल पुराना वीडियो डॉक्टर को पीटने के दावे से वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: #WATCH Former DMK Corporator Selvakumar hits a woman at a beauty salon in Tamil Nadu’s Perambalur. The incident took place on 25th May’ 18. He has been arrested by the police and has been suspended from primary membership of the party (Source: CCTV footage) pic.twitter.com/B623qaLc0k
